text: Ganpati Ramanath is an American engineer, currently John Tod Horton Professor of Materials Science and Engineering at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute and an Elected Fellow of the American Physical Society. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society Category:21st-century American engineers Category:University of Illinois alumni
title: Ganpati Ramanath
